name: My Spaceship Runs On Cows
description:
Please read the Devlog for recent updates!

ฅ^•ﻌ•^ฅ

A prototype project allowing me to test the limits of the Game Boy and Game Boy Color. I will be periodically updating and experimenting with this title as sort of a developer's sandbox. I have no intentions to carry this through as a fully realized piece, so don't get your hopes up!

The proto works for Game Boy Color and Original Game Boy.
